arts.ttl: Spurs missing two attackers for Wolves clash
arts.sum: Pressed further on Solanke – given he trained at the start of this week – Frank explained: “When there’s a bit of pain, it’s just to see if we can get it right for right now. Asked specifically about Solanke, Frank said: “It’s an ankle injury which has just been a little bit tricky.

arts.ttl: defender has his say on Wolves' chances at Tottenham
arts.sum: “I think the team should go with the right attitude and I think we have a good chance to win the first Premier League game.” Wolves’ winless league start has left them rooted to the bottom of the table, but Bueno said victory over Everton has helped restore confidence.

arts.ttl: Tottenham vs Wolves predictions: To Vitor, no spoils at on-fire Spurs
arts.sum: Vitor Pereira hopes Wolves' Carabao Cup win over Everton sparks an Old Gold upturn but Steve Davies thinks otherwise.

arts.ttl: The Wolves player who'll be the big 'headache' for Vitor Pereira ahead of Tottenham clash
arts.sum: Former Wolves defender Lee Naylor has named the player who will have given Vitor Pereira the biggest headache going into the game with Tottenham Hotspur. Krejci was especially impressive against Everton, and Lee Naylor believes the Czech star will now be giving Pereira the biggest headache for the Tottenham game.

arts.ttl: Wolves are in line to make unwanted Premier League history once again vs Tottenham
arts.sum: In Wolves’ last nine Premier League games, they have entered half-time losing, and that has left them on course to setting a new record. Wolves can set unwanted record for losing at half-time in consecutive games

arts.ttl: Wolves are the one team Richarlison always torches — here we go again
arts.sum: Richarlison has an impeccable record against Wolves, and he's certainly one to watch as Tottenham hosts Wolves in the Premier League this weekend.

arts.ttl: Premier League basement side Wolves bidding to extend unlikely four-game streak against Spurs
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers will be bidding to extend an unlikely streak when they square off against Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League on Saturday evening.

Tottenham produced arguably their best performance of the Thomas Frank era after coming from 2-0 down to rescue a draw at Brighton, which leaves them 3rd in the Premier League. Wolves have caused Spu...

arts.ttl: Paul Merson delivers Tottenham vs Wolves prediction, he is confident of the outcome
arts.sum: Paul Merson has delivered his weekly predictions once again, and after going with a Wolves win last weekend, he was not quite as kind this week. Paul Merson has now released his weekly predictions for the Premier League, and he has given his verdict on Wolves’ chances.

arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend games predictions - Week 6
arts.sum: The Premier League is back on Saturday and Sunday after the excitement of the midweek Carabao Cup action and Ross Kilvington provides a score prediction for all 10 top-flight matches in England.
